entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then showers beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 8. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023
